Safety: Fail-safe mode requires restricted speed
Economic impact: Passenger delays affect more people

alternativesConsidered.rejected: Too severe, violates passenger service standards

alternativesConsidered.option: Allow all trains at normal speed

alternativesConsidered.rejected: No alternative route available for this section

decisionExplanation.expectedOutcome: Safe passage with minimal passenger impact, freight delays acceptable
